mapper.insert: insert into SailToTMDB.CartItems (user_id, quantity, created_date, num_iid) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{quantity}, #{created_time}, #{num_iid});
mapper.select: select h.cart_id as cart_id, h.num_iid as num_iid, h.created_date as created_date, p.pic_url as pic_url, p.promotion_price as promotion_price, p.price as price, p.title as title, h.quantity as quantity from SailToTMDB.CartItems h, SailToTMDB.OneBoundApiTaobaoProduct p where h.user_id = #{user_id} and h.num_iid = p.num_iid order by h.created_date desc

select h.cart_id as cart_id, h.num_iid as num_iid, h.created_date as created_date, p.pic_url as pic_url, p.promotion_price as promotion_price, p.price as price, p.title as title, h.quantity as quantity from SailToTMDB.CartItems h, SailToTMDB.OneBoundApiTaobaoProduct p where h.user_id = #{user_id} and h.num_iid = p.num_iid and p.title LIKE #{q} order by h.created_date desc
